resources.string: Permission to run in the background
First, how would you rate the following aspects of your everyday life?
How many times do you wake up per night?
How often do you have night terrors?
How easily do you usually fall asleep?
How easily do you usually wake up?
How fresh do you usually feel after you wake up?
How happy do you usually feel during the day?
How sad do you usually feel during the day?
How sleepy do you usually feel during the day?
How tired do you usually feel during the day?
How stressed do you usually feel during the day?
How irritable do you usually feel during the day?
How hard is for you to concentrate during the day?
How hard is for you to coordinate your activities during the day?
How would you usually rate your appetite during the day?
GREAT! Here is your current avatar, reflecting your current state:
Please input either a goal, a wish, or any note. You can return to this section later.
